Title: Scientists use argon plasma to precisely position metal atoms, eliminating waste of precious metals
Description: Researchers have demonstrated that by using argon plasma, metal atoms can be dispersed and guided to desired positions. This new strategy ensures that not a single atom goes to waste and maximizes the use of rare and precious metals.
Text: Scientists use argon plasma to precisely position metal atoms, eliminating waste of precious metals. Researchers have demonstrated that by using argon plasma, metal atoms can be dispersed and guided to desired positions. This new strategy ensures that not a single atom goes to waste and maximizes the use of rare and precious metals.
